data.actual_result: The "Sync across clients." option is switched back on for all 3 categories
data.expected_result: The "Sync across clients." option should remain disabled
data.short_description: Syncing options reset when re-logging into your account
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings and disable the "Sync across clients." option for Text & Images, Appearance and Language - Press the Log Out button located in the top right corner of the display - Log back into your account and notice that the "Sync across clients." option is switched on for all 3 categories
